subject: Business Loan Application - Expansion Capital
body:
Dear Loan Department,

I am Robert Martinez, owner of Martinez Auto Repair LLC. I am applying for a business loan of $200,000 to expand my auto repair business.

Business Details:
- Business Name: Martinez Auto Repair LLC
- Years in Operation: 12 years
- Annual Revenue: $450,000
- Purpose: Purchase new equipment and expand to second location
- Business Account: BUS-ACC-2012-3344

I have attached:
- Business financial statements (last 3 years)
- Tax returns
- Business plan for expansion
- Equipment quotes

Please review and advise on the loan approval process and timeline.

Regards,
Robert Martinez
Phone: (555) 987-6543
